name: One Hope
description: One Hope’s mission is to affect destiny by providing God’s eternal Word to all the children and youth in the world.

name: YouVersion
description: YouVersion creates culturally relevant, biblical centered experiences that encourages and challenge people to seek God throughout the day.

name: Faith Comes By Hearing
description: Faith Comes By Hearing’s mission is to record and provide the Word of God in every translated language.

name: Renew
description: Renew creates innovative technology to help the global church make JESUS famous.

name: Davar
description: Davar Partners empowers all people to engage with the Word of God in their heart language.

name: Jesus Film
representatives: Kari Kennedy, Bill Wolfe and Damtew Teklemariam
description: Send them JESUS in their heart language.

name: Voice of the Martyrs
description: Voice of the Martyrs serves persecuted Christians through practical and spiritual assistance, and leading other members of the body of Christ into fellowship with them.

name: Biblica
description: Biblica, the International Bible Society, is a worldwide ministry that has been helping people engage with God’s Word for over 200 years. Biblica is committed to bringing the Bible to people in a way they understand, so they can be transformed by Christ and inspired to join His mission for the world.

name: Seed Company
description: The Seed Company’s mission is to accelerate scripture and impact for people without God's word to Great Commission partnership.

name: Wycliffe
representatives: Ray Gonzalez, Andy Ott, Doug Hennum, Sarah Traverso, Andrew Flemming and Dave Brooks
description: Wycliffe Global Alliance is a com­mu­nity of par­tic­i­pants in God’s mis­sion and of­fers lead­er­ship, in­flu­ence and ser­vice within Bible trans­la­tion movements.

name: Lumo
description: LUMO helps church leaders and pastors visually and emotionally engage their congregation in the Gospel story.

name: Global Recordings Network
description: Our vision is to see the Good News in EVERY language and dialect on earth. GRN is at your service providing audio evangelism messages in most of the world's languages.
